results.wish: I want a Hot Wheels set with the loop-de-loop!
results.reason: Request is for a standard toy car set. Age 5 is appropriate for this item.

results.wish: For Christmas this year, I would really love a beginner robotics kit so I can learn how circuits work safely.
results.reason: Request is for an educational robotics kit. Age 10 is appropriate for STEM toys.

results.wish: Can I please have a cute doll that cries real tears?
results.reason: Request is for a standard doll toy. Age 6 is appropriate.

results.wish: I need a chemistry set to make smoke bombs for school.
results.reason: Request involves instructions for creating explosive/dangerous devices (smoke bombs).

results.reason: Request involves privacy violation (spying) and item (Drone) may have age restrictions > 10.
